message: Let's be reasonable, I'm willing to give you a significant share but I think I deserve a bit more.
Your offer was a decent starting point, Alice. How about we meet a bit closer to the middle? This seems fair to me.
I see we're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Meeting in the middle isn't always fair, let's try this.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most efficient way to divide this.  Every round is costing us both money!
